page.title: 18HISTORICAL ORIGINS
page.content: In 1066 the land was given to{Ralph {Paganel}and{Ernest de Bruin}by{William the{Conqueror.}In 1217 the{Knights {Templar}settled at{Ribston.}In 1312 the land was given to the{Knights {Hospitallers.}In 1674 the house was built.In 1703 the chapel was improved. In 1705 special trees were planted, including the {Ribston pippin.}In 1754 the stables were built.In 1802{Harry {James}(aged 4) inherited {Ribston.}In 1833 he died and left{Ribston}to settle a gambling debt.In 1836{Ribston was bought by the{Dent family.}In 1978 the estate was passed to{Charles Dent. In 1980 he came to live at{Ribston with his family.In 1985 {Charles Dent has two children{James}and{Sarah. {Charles}has a{brother}called{Patrick, who lives at{Clock Farm}in{Hunsingore. He has only 1 child at the moment,his name is{Benjamin.}
